channel.title: [Added] Update to the ISO Country codelist - SZ eSwatini
channel.description:
The King of Swaziland has officially changed the name of the country to eSwatini or Kingdom of eSwatini. The [ISO Country codelist](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#iso:code:3166:SZ) has been updated to reflect this change. The code SZ remains the same.
This change is backwards compatible and will be added to the IATI Country Codelist. The relevant pull request is [here](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/pull/263).
